entry.title: What I cooked for dinner
entry.summary: A running list of what I am cooking for dinner. Use it for ideas or to entertain your boredom. This will be a long, ongoing list, so I'll keep it simple for you. Here's what to expect below: What I cooked (don't worry there will…
entry.content:
A running list of what I am cooking for dinner. Use it for ideas or to entertain your boredom. This will be a long, ongoing list, so I'll keep it simple for you. Here's what to expect below:
  • What I cooked (don't worry there will be a photo)
  • What I experimented with
  • What I liked and did not like
  • Other thoughts. I'll try to spare you here. I'm a cutthroat critic of my own cooking

Â
